versions.release_notes: We built a new feature that allows you to set specific seasonal and weekend rules for your listing. You can now set a minimum number of nights and a check in day for each rule!
Further stability tweaks to make managing your listing and your travels as easy as possible.
We've improved Host Home to make it easier to interact with potential guests, and you can now see your Performance information while on the go.
We’ve improved our search filters, so you can quickly find a place that’s right for you.

• With our improved navigation you can quickly access your trips, your inbox, and everything you need for traveling and hosting.
• Improved message threads for easier communication between hosts & guests
• Explore Host's local recommendations to make the most of your trip.
• Now, you don't to be online to access any listings, Wish Lists, reservation details, and messages that you've previously viewed.
• Now you can use PayPal to book your next adventure.\n• We’ve updated our calendar settings, so it’s easier for hosts to manage incoming reservation requests.
• Hosts can now quickly access their calendar from our main menu. \n• Now you can list or unlist your place from our Manage Listing screen.

Update in 4.5.1: fixed a crash upon launch

New in 4.5.0
- We’ve made improvements so it’s easier to sign up for Airbnb.
- If you have an iPhone 6 or 6 Plus, you can now book future trips with Apple Pay.
- You can now share Wishlists and listings with your friends on KakaoTalk, so it’s easier to coordinate your next adventure together. 
- You can quickly access and manage your settings with our new simplified Account screen.

- We’ve made improvements so it’s easier to sign up for Airbnb.
- If you have an iPhone 6 or 6 Plus, you can now book future trips with Apple Pay.
- You can now share Wishlists and listings with your friends on KakaoTalk, so it’s easier to coordinate your next adventure together. 
- You can quickly access and manage your settings with our new simplified Account screen.

- You can now view similar listings directly from every listing page, so it's easier than ever to find the perfect space. 
- You can now keep track of your schedule seamlessly! Airbnb events will appear on your Today screen on iOS 8. 
- You can now share listings with your friends through Facebook Messenger so you can coordinate your next adventure together. 
- We squished bugs so your iOS experience is better than ever
- Easily pass off pages in the app to your Mac running OS X Yosemite\n- We've fixed some crashes we noticed in our last release.
• We’re recognizing hosts! Now Superhosts will have a badge on their profile. \n• We squished bugs so your experience is better than ever.
We squished bugs so your iOS experience is better than ever.

- Have more control while on the go! We made it possible for guests to cancel a reservation through the app.
- We added Weibo and other networks as options for logging and verifying your ID. 
- We’ve made improvements to our search, so it’s easier to find the perfect place.
- We squished bugs so your iOS experience is better than ever.
We squished some bugs so your iOS experience is better than ever.

• Spaces look better than ever! We improved the resolution of every listing photo.
• We made it easier for guests and hosts to review each other with confidence.
• We added your previous trips to the My Trips section so you can trace your stays around the world.
• We made it easier to compare listings from the map view. Listing details are now prominently displayed at the top of the screen.
• We squished bugs so your iOS experience is better than ever.

The Airbnb you know and love has a brand new look. Install the update to check it out!

• A new symbol designed to capture the spirit of our community and express what it means to belong anywhere
• Richer colors and more vibrant photography inspired by Airbnb experiences all around the world
• Booking trips, managing your listings, and other features continue to work the same way as before
Further stability tweaks to make managing your listing and your travels as easy as possible.

• Get to know hosts and guests better before you book! You can now edit your profile to include details like work, school, languages spoken, and an “About Me” section. \r\n• You now have more control of your calendar! We made it simple to change the availability of your space for dates within broad ranges. \r\n• We found and fixed bugs to improve your app’s stability and speed.

• The app loads faster than ever! We increased the speed of the app’s startup time so you won’t have to wait to find, or list, a great space. \r\n• We made it easy for you to find your way! If your host provides directions to their listing, you’ll see them in the app. \r\n• We fixed bugs so your iOS experience will be better than ever.

• The app loads faster than ever! We increased the speed of the app’s startup time so you won’t have to wait to find, or list, a great space. \r\n• We made it easy for you to find your way! If your host provides directions to their listing, you’ll see them in the app. \r\n• We fixed bugs so your iOS experience will be better than ever.

• Invite friends and family to Airbnb and earn travel credit! We made our Referrals feature available on Sina Weibo, WeChat, and WhatsApp. \r\n• Sharing just got easier. You can now copy links to your favorite listings directly to your clipboard.  \r\n• Bugs: We found them and we fixed them! Your app should work better than ever.

• Invite friends and family to Airbnb and earn travel credit! We made our Referrals feature available on Sina Weibo, WeChat, and WhatsApp.\n• Sharing just got easier. You can now copy links to your favorite listings directly to your clipboard.\n• Bugs: We found them and we fixed them! Your app should work better than ever.
Further stability tweaks to make managing your listing and your travels as easy as possible.

• You can now activate Instant Book directly from your phone! Try Instant Book to make your space easier to find and simpler to rent. \r\n• We added more options to your Wish Lists controls. You can set your privacy preferences and delete collections when you’re ready to spring clean. \r\n• Respond faster than ever before. Check out the improvements we made to your saved messages feature.
Further stability tweaks to make managing your listing and your travels as easy as possible

- Now, invite friends from your phone and earn $25 if a friend travels and $75 if a friend hosts.
- Have a coupon code? You can now redeem your coupon while booking directly from your phone!
- We brought back the option to send a new special offer to a guest even if you previously sent them a pre-approval
- We squashed a lot of bugs!

- We've made a ton of bug fixes and polished up the Host experience.  \r\n- See your Social Connections with another user right on their profile. This is especially useful for Hosts to see their connections with a potential Guest at a glance.\r\n- Access a Host's overall calendar availability on their listing page.

New ways to stay. New ways to host. Airbnb for everyone.

For guests:
- Discover a home for any trip. When you book from a collection, you can expect a highly-rated home with all the essentials for the type of trip you’re taking—from equipped kitchens for families to wifi and self check-in for work trips.
- Introducing Airbnb Plus, a selection of homes verified for quality and comfort.

For hosts:
- Answer a few questions to make your listing more accurate, so guests looking for a home like yours can find it.
- Redefined property labels and new property types add clarity and help hosts with unique homes get discovered.
- Check if you qualify for the work or family collection, and track your progress as you add key amenities and improve your ratings.

Travel for work? Check out our new Business Travel Ready search filter. See homes with wifi, 24hr check-in and all the amenities perfect for a work trip. Business Travel Ready listings are top-rated homes with some of our most responsive hosts. Unlock the filter by adding your work email in Edit Profile.

Introducing the new Airbnb. Now, you’ve got homes, experiences, and places—all in one app.
 
Experiences - Book experiences led by local experts ranging from sushi chefs to surf legends.
 
Places - Get insider recommendations on where to go.
 
Itinerary - Add experiences, places, and events to your itinerary.
 
And a few extras, just for our hosts:
 
New mobile features - We heard your feedback and made improvements to the calendar and inbox to make managing listings easier than ever.
 
Co-hosts - Have a local co-host help with your listing while you’re away.

Introducing Airbnb for Apple Watch! The new app features Airbnb messaging, which hosts and travellers can use to communicate with each other instantaneously. Hosts  can receive a new booking request complete with the traveler’s name and photo, requested dates, and personal message, and decide whether to accept or decline on the spot. Hosts can also initiate and respond to messages, as well as create and save quick, pre-recorded responses to help maintain a healthy response rate.

We've improved our navigation, so now you can quickly access your inbox and wishlists and everything you need for travelling and hosting. In addition, we’ve made improvements to our search, so it’s easier to find the perfect place. Plus, we fixed a bug so now the app properly displays in Chinese!

Introducing Airbnb for iPad! \n\nWe customised our app for iPad so everything you need as a traveller and a host is at your fingertips. Enjoy seamless navigation, access your itinerary, check your messages, and respond to your guests with a few simple swipes.

store_info.title: Airbnb
store_info.description:
Unforgettable travel experiences start with Airbnb. Find travel adventures and new places to go faraway or near to you, and access vacation home rentals, new experiences, and places to visit all around the world. Book everything for your trip, or start earning money as a host. 

BOOK TRAVEL EXPERIENCES
Go on local experiences led by native experts, whether it’s for multiple days or just an afternoon. Explore Seoul's underground music scene, hunt for truffles in a Tuscan forest, or give back to the community with a social impact experience.

BOOK VACATION HOMES
Choose from over 4 million vacation home rentals across 191+ countries. Search by price, neighborhood, amenities, and more.

POPULAR DESTINATIONS
Experience the beautiful sights & find local guides for the perfect vacation:
• Rio – Explore the birth place of Samba or Hand Glide over the sights
• Paris – Find your fill in some of the best culinary tours and museums
• Barcelona – Discover the cities beauty with guided walking tours

For travelers: 
• Book vacation home rentals and travel experiences for your next solo journey, family vacation, or business trip
• Search for last minute travel accommodations or long term rentals
• Save your favorite rental homes, experiences, and places—and invite friends and family to plan the trip with you
• Add experiences and events to your itinerary
• Message your host and get directions to your home

For hosts:
• Share your extra space or lead experiences that showcase what makes your city great
• Update your listing and calendar availability
• Share what’s special about your neighborhood with a host guidebook
• Message guests and manage their reservations
store_info.subtitle: Vacation rentals & Experiences
store_info.promotionalText: Be at home in the world. Find the best vacation home rentals & apartments. Choose from over 4 millions homes. Make the most of your trip with our new experiences feature.

reviews.author: Comment i résister
reviews.title: Airbnb n’est plus une bonne application
reviews.content: Maintenant l’application ne cherche plus qu’à faire de l’argent et profiter des gens malgré que le service proposé de base est intéressant.

reviews.author: pandableu07
reviews.title: Manque de fonctionnalités pour les hôtes et intransigeance
reviews.content:
Ayant un statut de superhost, le fait d’avoir dû 1 seule fois annuler ( juste 3 jours après une réservation de dernière minute) pour soucis santé de ma maman, j’ai perdu ce statut après 2 ans de « bons et loyaux services ». J’ai tout de même obtenu gain de cause en adressant un message. 

De plus comme beaucoup de logements de vacances, le linge de maison devrait être une option à part, avec un complément à verser .

Enfin, pour modifier les parametrages du calendrier, des tarifs, ou autres, ce n’est pas aussi simple que cela.

reviews.author: Linoooooou
reviews.title: impossible de réserver
reviews.content: Je souhaite réserver un logement, ça m’annonce que celui-ci n’est pas disponible alors que selon les dates inscrites, si. J’essaie un autre, de même et encore un autre ça ne marche toujours pas. J’essaie sur DEUX autres téléphones et toujours rien. J’espère que ce problème sera réglé, une mise à jour serait peut-être efficace ???????????????????

reviews.author: KITCHEN STAR
reviews.title: Application super bien pensée
reviews.content:
Parfait aussi bien pour les hôtes que pour les voyageurs !
Les transactions sont très sécurisées ,  très facile pour mettre une annonce en ligne , les évaluations sont très faciles à faire et le concept est innovant .
Les paiements par PayPal sont extrêmement rapides 
Parfait en tout point

reviews.author: 62roro62
reviews.title: Mode de réservation
reviews.content: Bonsoir je trouve honteux votre nouveau mode de réservation. A l’époque du piratage informatique , de l’usurpation d’identité grandissante et des comptes Facebook visités , qui me garantit que mon identité sera garantie et préservée et qu’elle ne sera pas récupérée par des personnes malveillantes ? Êtes vous certains de l’intégrité des personnes qui louent les logements ? Nous avons donc réservé pour la dernière fois sur votre site . J’attends vos arguments de réponse avec impatience et grand intérêt . Cordialement Me N.

reviews.author: matthieu flora
reviews.title: Super
reviews.content: Nous avons passé un séjour au petits soins \nVivement recommandé 👍🏻😁

reviews.author: sanaz sky
reviews.title: Recommandation
reviews.content: Une première expérience d’Air b&b assez agréable, je me sentais chez moi avec une hôte chaleureuse qui vous pouvez sentir le soleil d’Espagne tout les jours ☀️\nJe vous recommande vivement et fortement ☺️\nEt mille fois merci Jessica 😍

reviews.author: cléfauch
reviews.title: Le top pour arrondir ces fins de mois
reviews.content: App idéale pour louer son appart entre particuliers. En y renseignant ses propres règles de conduite, on y rencontre des gens respectueux avec lesquels communiquer très facilement avec la messagerie instantanée.

reviews.author: Cecile m
reviews.title: Du top
reviews.content: Site très complet et très facile d’utilisation, bien pensé que ce soit pour la gestion de sa location ou trouver un endroit où aller en vacances

reviews.author: Chabble
reviews.title: Un service du siècle dernier!
reviews.content: Je prépare mes vacances 6 mois à l’avance et finalement, avec 4 mois de préavis, je souhaite changer de destination : AirBNB annonce me prélever plus de 200€ de frais de dossier!!!

reviews.author: clarissgram
reviews.title: Satisfaite
reviews.content: Deux airbnb effectués, je suis satisfaite.

reviews.author: Telenko
reviews.title: Trop intrusif
reviews.content: Vos procédures sont trop intrusives et ne garantissent rien. Vous avez coché par défaut le partage avec Facebook et Google. Ce n’est pas sécurisant. On ne peut pas vous donner une copie du passeport et cb et avoir en même temps un partage Google et Facebook qui ne garantissent aucune sécurité il faut choisir entre fiabilité et fric facile ...

reviews.author: Paul perrine
reviews.title: Très bien
reviews.content: Appli très pratique et bien pensé dommage qu on soit encore obligé de passer par le web pour les facture

reviews.author: Élisemir 54
reviews.title: Site fluide
reviews.content: Le site est fluide et très intuitif. L’assistance fonctionne également très bien tant par téléphone que par écrit. \nJe recommande vivement.
